text: Anne-Aymone Giscard d'Estaing, born Anne-Aymone Marie Josèphe Christiane Sauvage de Brantès on 10 April 1933 in Paris), is the widow of 20th President of France Valéry Giscard d'Estaing. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies of France Category:Politicians from Paris Category:Valéry Giscard d'Estaing
title: Anne-Aymone Giscard d'Estaing
